title: Calibre 7.0 E-Book Manager Introduces New Notes Feature, Support for Audio EPUBs
description:
Calibre 7.0 open-source e-book manager is now available for download with a new Notes feature, support for Audio EPUB books, built-in Trash feature, and more.

The post Calibre 7.0 E-Book Manager Introduces New Notes Feature, Support for Audio EPUBs appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: It’s Official: Linux Kernel 6.6 Will Be LTS, Supported Until December 2026
description:
Linux kernel 6.6 is now officially marked as LTS (Long-Term Support) on the kernel.org website and it will be supported until December 2026.

The post It’s Official: Linux Kernel 6.6 Will Be LTS, Supported Until December 2026 appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
